items.sentence: Mary tied an apron around her waist and then took the turkey out of the oven.
Tom spends all day speaking French at school and only speaks English at home.
Tom wondered if he should pretend to appreciate the dinner Mary made for him.
Tom would often make mistakes purposely just so the teacher would notice him.
I think it\'s unlikely that a situation like this one would ever occur again.
If I were to study French, I\'d prefer to study with a native French speaker.
The best cookies I\'ve ever eaten are the ones that your mother baked for me.
Tom is still wearing his wedding ring, even though he\'s not married anymore.
Why don\'t you hang around a while after everyone else leaves so we can talk?
After I graduated from college, I spent two years traveling around the world.
